updateElements.mainContentHeader: This update requires your device to restart
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take around 30 minutes to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
Your Houzz issued device requires a fully up-to-date device to ensure that IT can accurately protect your device.

As soon as you are able, please save your work and install updates. This update will require your machine to restart.

If you have any questions, submit a ticket at https://toolbox.houzz.com/support/home.
updateElements.mainHeader: Action Required - Your device requires a security update
updateElements.subHeader: A friendly reminder from your Houzz IT team
